argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplgrp.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPwSer R ) = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> I e. V ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_psrlmod | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( I mPwSer R ) e. LMod ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` P ) = ( Base ` P ) |
| 7 | 2, 1, 6, 3, 4 | #P_mpllss | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( Base ` P ) e. ( LSubSp ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 6 | #P_mplval2 | |- P = ( ( I mPwSer R ) |`s ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( LSubSp ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_lsslmod | |- ( ( ( I mPwSer R ) e. LMod /\ ( Base ` P ) e. ( LSubSp ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) -> P e. LMod ) |
| 11 | 5, 7, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> P e. LMod ) |
